I tried to upload the code, but kept getting errors from the system ...
possibly from time-outs.  I'll try again, and if that doesn't work, I'll put
the ZIP file somewhere and let the Snowstorm people grab it :)
 
For the fsgames.com site ... I keep meaning to update it, but just haven't
had a chance lately.  Things with Warcraft III have kept us pretty busy, and
now that *that's* passed, another project is taking up time... you know how
it goes :) But hopefully we'll get it updated some time!
 
--Tom

Anyway, uh, is the old fsgames.com website ever gonna get updated?
